loadingPhrases: Relax while we search for the best radio stations in cyberspace.
Just a second, a life without music is a body without a soul.
We are reaching the ends of space to connect with the best stations.
It's almost there, Without music, life would be a mistake.
Wait a little, we are finding the best for your ears.
Give us a little more time, music is the true universal language.
We should consider the day in which we have not danced as a lost day.

notifications.text: Houston, we have a problem! Cannot connect to this station, but you can try another.
